title: Romance Guide
content:
ologue is complete, she will leave. Players can find her on Revenge Beach, north of the Roadside Cliffs. To learn more about Lae'zel, please visit her page by clicking here.

Lae'zel Approval Guide in BG3

Players will have to make tougher, more aggressive decisions and dialog choices as Lae'zel isn't a very sympathetic or sentimental person. Before romancing Lae'zel, players will need to make sure to be as chaotic as she is, as she is only on the journey for her own interests and is not willing
